content: Hi all! I'm Nick, crestfallen C++ programmer. I have been using Rust for about a year for a private/hobby project and I am really enjoying it. I've never been this productive in a programming language, and the amount of bugs is so low compared to my C++ work, it's really wonderful. I joined this chat mostly to lurk in some working groups. I'm also on Discord as "Knor" and on Twitter I'm CodingNickNick.
